properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 9:02AM EST until February 11 at 1:28AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...North Carolina...

Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax
Counties
Dan River near Danville affecting Caswell...Rockingham...City of
Danville and Pittsylvania Counties
Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County

Moderate flooding is occurring or is forecast to occur along
the Dan River from Danville to South Boston. Minor flooding
is occurring along the Roanoke at Randolph.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Dan River at South Boston.
* until late Monday night.
* at 08AM Saturday the stage was 28.4 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 30.4 feet by after midnight
tonight. The river will fall below flood stage Monday
afternoon.
* Impact...at 29.5 feet...Route 501 begins to flood and number of
businesses in the Riverdale area are affected.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 31.4
feet on Oct 13 2018.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.


The next scheduled statement will be issued by 4pm today.
